result.execSummary:
Michael Dennis Jerry was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Michael Dennis Jerry was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Dennis Jerry

defendant.name: Jerry, Michael Dennis
defendant.address: 739 Portland Avenue, Saint Pail Park, MN 55071

records.addlTxt: Bail/bond hearing on February 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:   Bela Alexander Ballo   DF ATTY:  Jeremiah James Harrelson   DF:  Michael Dennis Jerry appeared from jail via video. Court notes this matter was heard yesterday. DE now understands better and wishes to voluntarily waive extradition to Washington County, MN.  Defendant executes Waiver and court certifies same.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for February 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Extradition hearing on March 16, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:   Michael Joseph Becker DF ATTY:  Scott Selmer for purposes of today  DF:  Michael Dennis Jerry appeared from jai by video. Case called at 1:27 p.m. DE has a copy of the fugitive complaint from Washington County, MN.  Defendant contests extradition. Court will hold DE for the next 30 days without bond for the Governor's Warrant.  Extradition hearing scheduled for March 16, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Extradition Attachment, Washington County, MN. mw
Signed by DE and RMW on 02/17/22. hml
